name: Tapes (Okeanos05)
description:
Greetings, stranger…

Have you ever been alone, lost in a forest?

Are you capable of completing every obstacle to survive? What are your chances?

Try it yourself!

Controls: WASD for walk, E to pick up, C to open camera.

FAQ:

Q: How can I complete falling rocks challenge?

A: You are not fast enough to go under them if you stop the rocks only once so you have to stop them from falling multiple times in the middle of the run.

Game was made by Jiří Vojtěch and Lukáš Gallo.

You can finish the game. If there are any problems that you might think can prevent you from finishing the game, let us know in the comments and we will help you.
